name: Jonathan DeYoe
what_you_do: Mission-based financial education company providing coaching, courses, and membership programs to help individuals and families build personal finance acumen with a mindful, goal-focused approach.
who_you_serve: Individuals and families without access to traditional financial advice who want a simple, low-maintenance approach to personal finance and investing.
social_proof: Jonathan DeYoe is the bestselling author of two books: Mindful Money and Mindful Investing.
signature_programs: Financial Education courses (18 modules), Values Purpose & Goals course (free), DIY Financial Plan, Financial Independence Bootcamp (3-day live workshop), Mindful Money Membership (group coaching program), Philanthropy Advisory, Mindful Money Weekly newsletter, Mindful Money Podcast
business_focus: Making transformational financial guidance honest, accessible, and affordable through education and group coaching rather than traditional fee-based advisory services.
service_provided: Financial education courses, Financial Independence Bootcamp, Mindful Money Membership (group coaching), Philanthropy Advisory, podcast, newsletter, books
